attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: So I got the app and it was horrible too many horrible things to say in one review so I’m just going to leave it as horrible

attributes.review: This app is bad it is slow and glitchy and hard to use

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of good things but it mad my phone crash multiple times a day

attributes.title: oml help
attributes.review: so I downloaded the app and then I was blinded by an ogre, turns out it was just a crusty orange peel. Because of this misfortune I had to uninstall, I will be forwarding my hospital bill to the White House thanks

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app does the opposite of what I want. I want to see my amazing presidents political views and get the word out but this app keeps on crashing and exiting. Worst purchase ever! -3/10

attributes.title: very bad
attributes.review: it doesn’t work, conveys no information. I got a lot of spam after downloading this app and no thank you!!!! very bad.

attributes.title: This app may be worse than the president himself
attributes.review: Kept causing my phone to crash so I couldn’t even reserve fake tickets for his rally! Sad Gen Zer over here

attributes.title: 𝔀𝓸𝓪𝓱

attributes.title: Worst app ever created 😐😐
attributes.review: The title says it all I’m too lazy to write a paragraph just save your self the time and gigabytes. Also the orange 🍊 man needs to make improvements on the app and on himself 😁
